translation.firstToAccept: The first to accept your request will share your session
translation.digits: 3 or 4 digits usually found on the signature strip
translation.missionDescription: CoachyAssist was created with a clear mission: to make personal coaching accessible to everyone. We believe that every individual deserves a chance to improve their life, and that's what we aim to offer.
translation.aboutDescription: At CoachyAssist, we are passionate about personal transformation. Our dedicated team works tirelessly to create a platform where aspirations meet endless possibilities.
translation.ourOffer1Description: Explore a diverse range of expert coaches in different fields, ready to guide you towards your unique goals.
translation.ourOffer2Description: Our location feature ensures that you can find coaches nearby, making the experience more convenient and personal.
translation.ourOffer3Description: Establish direct communication with your coach through our real-time messaging feature, fostering continuous engagement.
translation.engageForChangeDescription: CoachyAssist is not just an app; it's a partnership in your transformation journey. Join us to discover how you can elevate your aspirations and achieve your goals with the support of a dedicated community.
translation.navigateToGoogleMaps: You will be redirected to the Google Maps app during navigation. Once there, press the back button at the bottom of your phone's screen to return to the Coachy app.
translation.3or4Digits: 3 or 4 digits usually found on the signature strip
translation.redirectVersMap: You will be redirected to the Google Maps app during navigation. Once there, press the back button at the bottom of your phone's screen to return to the Coachy app.
